nodes.bodyText: Maybe we can move this under a subdirectory with a descriptive name so it is clear what this file is about.
can we add longer names for s and t so it is clear what they are?
This block is repeated over and over.  Let's make a function and reuse it.
We should read it back and verify we can return what we wrote out.
